resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>1369c2dd-fcba-4c6e-9e10-3faf6581a88e#1#1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Reflexív vázlata</string>
            <string language="en">Sketch of reflex arc</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Skizze des Reflexbogens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Croquis d'arc réflexe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esboço do arco reflexo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Abbozzo dell'arco riflesso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σκίτσο του ανακλαστικού τόξου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Bosquejo del arco reflejo</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Reflexív vázlata - az idegsejtek kapcsolatainak és típusainak feltüntetésével</string>
            <string language="en">Sketch of reflex arc - shown with the connections and types of neurons</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">szabályozás,  idegrendszer,  reflexív,  reflex,  érző idegsejt,  mozgató idegsejt,  köztes neuron,  interneuron,  </string>
            <string language="en">regulation, nervous system, reflex arc, reflex, sensory neuron, motorial neuron, intercultural neuron, interneuron</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Skizze des Reflexbogens - gezeigt mit den 
Anschlüssen und den Typen der Neuronen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Croquis de l'arc réflexe - montré avec les 
connexions et les types de neurones</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esboço do arco reflexo - mostrado com as 
conexões e os tipos de neurônios</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Abbozzo dell'arco riflesso - indicato con i 
collegamenti ed i tipi di neuroni</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σκίτσο του ανακλαστικού τόξου - που εμφανίζεται με τις
συνδέσεις και τους τύπους νευρώνων</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Bosquejo del arco reflejo - mostrado con las 
conexiones y los tipos de neuronas</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Regelung, nervöses System, Reflexbogen, Reflex, 
sensorisches Neuron, motorial Neuron, interkulturelles Neuron, 
interneuron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">règlement, système nerveux, arc réflexe, réflexe, 
neurone sensoriel, neurone motorial, neurone interculturel, 
interneuron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">regulamento, sistema nervoso, arco reflexo, reflex, 
neurônio sensory, neurônio motorial, neurônio intercultural, 
interneuron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">regolazione, sistema nervoso, arco riflesso, riflesso, 
neurone sensoriale, neurone motorial, neurone intercultural, 
interneuron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κανονισμός, νευρικό σύστημα, ανακλαστικό τόξο, 
ανακλαστικός, αισθητήριος νευρώνας, motorial νευρώνας, 
διαπολιτισμικός νευρώνας, interneuron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">regulación, sistema nervioso, arco reflejo, reflejo, 
neurona sensorial, neurona motorial, neurona intercultural, 
interneuron</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
